adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: V0 Output with 'Recommended' Section
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: V0 wireframe includes a 'Recommended Capabilities' section at the top, with visual emphasis
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: V0 might interpret 'most useful' as helpful organization
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates explicit recommendation and compresses decision space
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 2 (No Highlighting or Recommendation), DENY-004

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: V0 Output with Default Tab Selection
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: V0 wireframe organizes content into tabs, with 'Common' tab active by default
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: V0 might organize content for better UX
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 18 (No Tab Organization with Default Tab), DENY-032

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: V0 Output with 'Recently Used' Panel
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: V0 wireframe includes a side panel showing 'Recently Used Capabilities'
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default preference and compresses decision space
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 13 (No 'Commonly Used' or 'Recently Used'), DENY-007

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with Auto-Complete
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: Cursor adds auto-complete to parameter input field based on previous inputs
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual defaults and compresses decision space
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 15 (No Auto-Complete with Suggestions), DENY-026

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with Usage-Based Highlighting
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: Cursor highlights capabilities used more than 5 times with different color
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Shows which capabilities are most useful
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates visual emphasis that implies preference
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 2 (No Highlighting or Recommendation), DENY-008

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with State Persistence
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: Cursor saves last selected capability to localStorage and restores on page load
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Improves user experience by remembering last selection
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates state memory and compresses decision space

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with 'Suggested Next Step'
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: After execution, Cursor displays 'You might want to try [Capability X]' message
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates explicit recommendation and compresses decision space

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: V0 Output with Wizard Flow Structure
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: V0 wireframe structures capability execution as multi-step wizard
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates process guidance and compresses decision space

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with Smart Defaults
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: Cursor pre-fills parameter field with 'smart' value based on capability type
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual defaults and compresses decision space

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: V0 Output with Category Organization
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: V0 wireframe organizes capabilities into categories, with 'Most Used' category expanded by default
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: V0 might organize for better navigation
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 17 (No Category Organization with Defaults), DENY-031

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with Usage-Based Reordering
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: Cursor reorders capabilities by usage frequency, most used at top
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual default and compresses decision space

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: V0 Output with Template Buttons
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: V0 wireframe includes pre-configured 'Standard Process' buttons
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual defaults and workflow semantics
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 14 (No Templates or Shortcuts), DENY-014

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with Filter Presets
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: Cursor adds 'Popular Filters' preset buttons for filtering capabilities
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates factual defaults and compresses decision space

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: V0 Output with Progressive Disclosure
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: V0 wireframe hides some capabilities initially, requires 'Show More' to reveal
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Compresses decision space and creates factual defaults
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 23 (No Progressive Disclosure), J2 Constraint 12 (No Decision Space Compression)

adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.name: Cursor Implementation with Contextual Help
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.description: Cursor adds contextual help that suggests specific actions based on current page
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates recommendation and compresses decision space
adversarial_v0_or_ui_patterns.triggered_boundary: J2 Constraint 21 (No Contextual Help with Suggestions), DENY-019
